scenes.background: Monica glances at her watch and sighs.
scenes.description: Bob says, We need to wrap this up soon, Monica is getting impatient.

options.text: Maybe we should prioritize the most critical points and finish quickly.
options.analysis: You propose focusing on key issues to expedite the meeting, demonstrating good perception and empathy.

options.text: Let's stick to our previous approach. Thoroughness is key to avoiding future issues.
options.analysis: You stress the importance of a thorough approach, showing good self-regulation and social skill.

options.text: Monica, we understand your urgency, but a few more minutes won't hurt to ensure quality.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Monica's urgency while emphasizing the importance of quality, demonstrating empathy.
